issue.title: Make easySDI proxy cache invalidation plugin optionally silent
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Every time an easySDI user on joomla user is saved, we have the confirmation message,
but front end users don't care about this technical feature.

I propose to make this optional (configuration of the plugin)

Current message in front-end edit:
!account_edit_message.png!

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2
